page.title: 17Home Life (cont)
page.content: Electrical/Battery: computer,video, Scalectrix,Speak n Spell,train set, Scrabble, Simon,Mastermind,radio controlled cars/models, Battleships, Caveman, Little Professor, Buzz Off, King Kong. Clockwork: Perfection,Lego,robots, train set. Construction toys: Lego, Meccano, Plasticine, Stickle Bricks, Fashions by Me,Building blocks in plastic & wood, Fashion wheel, Airfix, felt craft, Bolt and Build. Floor: Twister, marbles, Scaredy Cat, bowls, Booby Trap. Table/Board Games: Jigsaw, Painting by Numbers, Chess, Draughts, Snakes& Ladders, Connect 4, Monopoly, Scrabble, Table Tennis, Mousetrap, Snooker/Billiards, Subuteo, Test Match, Dungeons & Dragons, Hungry Hippo, Pacman, Mastermind, Cluedo.
